publications.title: Abstract Visual Reasoning Enabled by Language
publications.tldr: First to showcase that LLMs can be applied on the ARC-AGI benchmark to solve abstract visual reasoning problems by using language structure.

publications.title: Traffic4cast at neurips 2022–predict dynamics along graph edges from sparse node data: Whole city traffic and eta from stationary vehicle detectors
publications.tldr: Traffic Forecasting using graph neural networks to predict traffic dynamics and estimated time of arrival (ETA) from sparse sensor data in urban environments.

publications.title: Flood and Echo Net: Algorithmically Aligned GNNs that Generalize
publications.tldr: Introduces the Flood-and-Echo GNN architecture inspired by distributed algorithms, enabling more scalable and generalizable graph reasoning.

publications.title: Learning Graph Algorithms With Recurrent Graph Neural Networks
publications.tldr: Use recurrent graph neural networks to learn on algorithmic tasks and extrapolate to graphs 1000 times larger.

publications.title: Hierarchical Graph Structures for Congestion and ETA Prediction
publications.tldr: Uses hierarchical graph representations and multi-task learning to jointly predict congestion levels and ETA on real-world road networks.

publications.title: Synthetic Data for Blood Vessel Network Extraction
publications.tldr: Proposes a synthetic pipeline to generate vascular networks and corresponding imagery to pre-train models for blood vessel segmentation when annotated real data is scarce.

publications.title: GraphFSA: A Finite State Automaton Framework for Algorithmic Learning on Graphs
publications.tldr: Proposes a framework that models algorithmic graph tasks using finite state automata, enabling interpretable algorithmic graph learning.

publications.title: SURF: A Generalization Benchmark for GNNs Predicting Fluid Dynamics
publications.tldr: Introduces SURF, a benchmark designed to evaluate a model's ability to generalize across different fluid regimes and resolutions in physics simulations.

publications.title: Decentralized Graph Processing for Reachability Queries
publications.tldr: Develops decentralized labeling scheme for answering reachability queries efficiently.

publications.title: Learn to Jump: Adaptive Random Walks for Long-Range Propagation through Graph Hierarchies
publications.tldr: Introduces adaptive random-walk mechanisms that allow long-range graph propagation by dynamically selecting jump levels in hierarchical graph structures.

publications.title: Reinforcement Learning for Locally Checkable Labeling Problems
publications.tldr: Applies a verifier driven learning approach to solve locally checkable labeling problems for neural algorithmic reasoning.

publications.title: Beyond Interpolation: Extrapolative Reasoning with Reinforcement Learning and Graph Neural Networks
publications.tldr: Investigates Generalisation in Transformers and GNNs on Puzzle Data using RL and GNNs to perform extrapolative reasoning.

publications.title: Rethinking Message Passing for Algorithmic Alignment
publications.tldr: Proposes alternative message-passing mechanisms with better alignment to algorithmic graph computations and improved generalization properties.

publications.title: A New Perspective for Graph Learning Architecture Design: Linearize Your Depth Away
publications.tldr: Investigates using State-Space Model Linearization as a general graph architecture technique that effectively linearizes sequential depth to improve deep graph learning.
